item.title: Serviio Plugin Install – Stream YouTube and Twitch.tv/Justin.tv channels to PS3, XBOX 360, Android
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
Plugins for what?      Plugins for Serviio offer support for all sorts of online media, most if not all can be downloaded for free from forum.serviio.org. In the video I demonstrate how to download and install a plugin pack called A.P.P, which is a whole collection of plugins. After the plugins are installed, feeds or web […]

The post Serviio Plugin Install – Stream YouTube and Twitch.tv/Justin.tv channels to PS3, XBOX 360, Android first appeared on RobWillis.info.

item.title: Ultimate Serviio Media Server Setup Guide – Stream to PS3, XBOX 360, Android…(Video)
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
Running a media server?      I have been running my own media server for a few years now and it really has become a part of our entertainment system. The Serviio application itself is completely free and allows you to stream all of your pictures, video and music from a pc directly to any DLNA supported […]

The post Ultimate Serviio Media Server Setup Guide – Stream to PS3, XBOX 360, Android…(Video) first appeared on RobWillis.info.

item.title: How-To: Setting up a PS3 Media Server
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
Intro: In this video I demonstrate how to set up a PS3 Media Server on a Windows 7 x64 machine. The PS3 Media Server is a small Java application that will enable a pc to stream local media files to a PS3 on the same network. PMS also is able to decode and stream formats […]

The post How-To: Setting up a PS3 Media Server first appeared on RobWillis.info.
